hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:The rider should first greet the pedestrian, and the pedestrian the one who is seated and a small group should greet a larger group (with as-Salam-u-'Alaikum)

chapter.ara-name: باب يُسَلِّمُ الرَّاكِبُ عَلَى الْمَاشِي وَالْقَلِيلُ عَلَى الْكَثِيرِ
chapter.eng-name: The One Who Is Riding Should Greet The One Who Is Walking, And The Smaller Group Should Greet The Larger Group
